message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'StatsMessages.JobFailed' import. Should be before 'java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'StatsMessages.StatsResult' import. Should be before 'java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.ActorRef' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.Duration'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.ReceiveTimeout' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.Duration'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.AbstractActor' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.Duration'.
'self' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be 12.
